document.full_text: germany is urging athens to adopt contingency plans that would foresee a voluntary, "market-friendly" debt restructuring should greece fail to meet its ambitious fiscal targets, the financial times reported.
document.title: germany pressing athens to restructure debt: report
lines_and_colors: germany is urging athens to adopt contingency plans that would foresee a voluntary, "market-friendly" debt restructuring should greece fail to meet its ambitious fiscal targets, the financial times reported.
